column3: Traffic;Siem Reap:------ An accident occurred at 8:00 pm on January 3
column11: collided with a street light in the middle of the road.------The car overturned and a 40-year-old man was thrown out
column12: causing serious injuries. Was rescued by a rescuers Victims to recover and heal. The car was measured by the competent authorities and waited for a legal settlement.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/282941
